name: Sprint Daytona Duel for Nascar
description:
HD Graphics!

Knowledge is pure racing power in this one. Stock car racing is one of the most exciting sports in the world, strap in we are going for a ride!

With one or two player mode, your sure to get some adrenaline as you race through the different challenges!
